name: Outer Beckons
desc:
Distracting and disturbing whispers haunt the target, who must succeed on an Intuition saving throw. On a failure, every time it makes an attack roll or ability check, it rolls 1d6 and subtracts the result from its roll.

The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns where it fails an attack roll or ability check. On a success, the spell ends.
